Title: The influence of good corporate governance, financial and environmental performance towards firm value: Case of manufacturing companies in Indonesia
Source title: International Journal of Innovative Technology and Exploring Engineering
Affiliations: Faculty of Economics an Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Accounting Department, Faculty of Economics and Communications, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Rusmanto, T., Faculty of Economics an Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Lisal, M., Accounting Department, Faculty of Economics and Communications, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Abstract: This study aims to observe and analyze the influence of proportion of independent board commissioners, the audit committee, board of directors, return on asset, return on equity and environmental performance towards firm value. Firm value was proxied with Tobin’s Q. The population in this study is manufacturing companies listed in Indonesia Stock Exchange year 2013 – 2017. The study used 18 sample companies from 160 companies. The sample was determined by using purposive sampling. The result of this study showed that proportion of independent board commissioners, audit committee and Return On Assets has a significant effect on firm value while the board of directors, Return On Equity and PROPER has no significant effect on firm value. © BEIESP.
Author Keywords: Audit committee; Board of directors; Commissioners board; Return on asset; Return on equity
References: Retno, R.D., Priantinah, D., The effect of Good Corporate Governance dan Corporate Social Responsibility Disclosure on Company Value (2014) Jurnal Nominal, 1 (1), pp. 84-103; Ardimaswardoyo, W., The effect of Financial Performance and CSR on Company Value on Banking Industry (2014) Jurnal Manajemen Dan Bisnis, 18 (1), pp. 57-66; Monika, M., The Impact of Financial Performance on Company Value in Manufacturing Industry (2014) Jurnal Manajemen Dan Bisnis, 12 (1), pp. 1-16; Almiliaspica, L., Factors Affecting CSR Disclosure, and the Impact of Company Size (2011) Fokus Ekonomi, 10 (1), pp. 50-68; Ghozali, I., (2016) Multivariate Analysis Using SPSS 23, , Semarang: Badan Penerbit Universitas Diponegoro; Anjarsari, P.S., Andriati, H.N., The Effect of Good Corporate Governance and Environmentsl Performance on Comapny Value (2016) Jurnal Akuntansi Dan Keuangan Daerah, 11 (2), pp. 52-59; Fiadicha, F., Hanny, R., The Impact of Good Corporate Governance, Corporate Social Responsibility and Financila Performance on Company Value (2016) Jurnal Akuntansi Manajerial, 1 (1), pp. 22-45; Sucuahi, W., Cambarihan, J.M., Influence of Profitability to the Firm Value of Diversified Companies in the Philippines (2016) Accounting and Finance Research, 5 (2), pp. 149-153; Putra, I.P.M.J.S., Juniariani, N.M.R., An Analyisi on Financial Performance Ratio Towards Company (2017) Jurnal Riset Akuntansi, 7 (2), pp. 143-150
